sentences.en: "Daniel," Pat said, her voice harsh with urgency. "Come out here immediately."
sentences.cn: “丹尼尔，”帕特说道，她的嗓音因为急迫而有些沙哑，“马上出来。”

sentences.en: He had a deepening sense of the urgency of the aid effort.
sentences.cn: 他深深感到,援助工作是刻不容缓的.

sentences.en: Her mind prodded to action by his feverish urgency.
sentences.cn: 经他这么热心地催促,她只得极力想起法子来.

sentences.en: However pressing the need and urgency of the problem one should not proceed without a plausible plan.
sentences.cn: 无论需要多么紧迫，问题多么紧急，一个人不能没有看似有理的计划就开始行动。

sentences.en: I appreciate the sense of urgency because I feel it myself.
sentences.cn: 我欣赏这种紧迫的感觉因为我自己就能体会到。

sentences.en: In case of urgency, call the police.
sentences.cn: 一旦发生紧急情况, 打电话给警察.

sentences.en: It is a matter of the utmost urgency to find out what has happened to these people.
sentences.cn: 当务之急是要弄清楚这些人出了什么事。

sentences.en: It is a matter of utmost urgency.
She was surprised at the urgency in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他语调中透着急迫，这让她很吃惊。

sentences.en: The urgency of finding a cure attracted some of the best minds in medical science.
sentences.cn: 找到治愈方法的紧迫性吸引了医学领域一些最有才华的人。

sentences.en: The urgency of his voice galvanized them into action .
sentences.cn: 他急迫的声音激励他们行动起来。

sentences.en: The urgency of the situation requires that we should make an immediate decision.
sentences.cn: 局势紧迫,需要我们立即做出决定.

sentences.en: There is a particular urgency in this case, and it would help if you could bend the rules.
sentences.cn: 这次碰巧有紧急情况，如果您能通融一下就好了。

sentences.en: They recognise the urgency of righting the economy.
sentences.cn: 他们认识到了复苏经济的紧迫性。

sentences.en: This is a matter of great urgency.
sentences.cn: 这是一件十分紧急的事情.

sentences.en: To combat drought and protect the seedlings is a matter of great urgency.
Your doctor and health visitor can help a great deal and you need to talk about it with them as a matter of urgency.
sentences.cn: 你的医生和家访护士会帮很大的忙。你应该和他们谈一谈，这是当务之急。

words.tran_cn: 强烈的欲望，迫切要求；推动力
